kmax pooling

{% raw %}

kmax_pooling[source]

kmax_pooling(x, dim, k)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Tests

{% raw %} 
x = torch.tensor([[8, 7, 8, 7, 9],
                  [6, 3, 5, 9, 7]])
output = kmax_pooling(x, dim=1, k=3)
expected_output = torch.tensor([[8, 8, 9], 
                                [6, 9, 7]])

test_eq(output, expected_output)
{% endraw %}

avg pooling

{% raw %}

avg_pooling[source]

avg_pooling(x, dim)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Tests

{% raw %} 
x = torch.tensor([[8, 7, 8, 7, 9],
                  [6, 3, 5, 9, 7]])
output = avg_pooling(x, dim=1).round()
expected_output = torch.tensor([8., 6.])

test_eq(output, expected_output)
{% endraw %}
